channel.title: How do i set skill capes + hoods untradable?

item.title: How do i set skill capes + hoods untradable?
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“F00L I K0, post:6, topic:141716”][quote author=Flaton link=topic=194035.msg1743418#msg1743418 date=1189366094]
Why would you want to?

This would only be good if you had a shop open with them.

But, still, even thats bad, because ANYONE can buy them, even without the 99 stat.
[/quote]
Not neccesaliry, you could set it so you need for example lvl 99 Attack to trade with this shop.
I have used this method on my server.[/quote]
How u do that? But how could i set it so what eva one u want to buy it likes look if ur 99 in that skill, I hope you could help me

Read full topic

item.title: How do i set skill capes + hoods untradable?
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

[quote=“Flaton, post:3, topic:141716”]Why would you want to?

This would only be good if you had a shop open with them.

But, still, even thats bad, because ANYONE can buy them, even without the 99 stat.[/quote]
Not neccesaliry, you could set it so you need for example lvl 99 Attack to trade with this shop.
I have used this method on my server.

@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Not with me… u need 99 to hold. But there tradable i dont want it to be… And when u get 99 skill in my server it auto gives u cape + hood.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 08:30:59 AM[/size][hr]And, When ppl die i dont want it to be shown on the floor. Please help… =)
